com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity

Class AbstractBaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.PermissionManagerActivity
        • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.LocationActivity
          • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.PickerActivity
            • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.AbstractBaseActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRealmActivity, BaseLoginActivity, BaseRegistrazioneActivity, GalleryActivity

    public abstract class AbstractBaseActivity
extends PickerActivity
    Class that manages the Base Activity that every activity should extends
